id: # id: Required. The id of the paintjob. Must be unique. Prefix with your mod id.
# hullId: Required. The id of the hull that this paintjob applies to. Must be a valid hull id.
# name: Required. The name of the paintjob.

hullId: default none. The description of the paintjob. Aim for one or two sentences. If not unlocked by default
name: put unlock conditions here.
the paintjob is unlocked by default. Otherwise
description: it must be manually unlocked using code (e.g. in achievement complete code).

id: # spriteId: Required. The path or spriteName of the ship sprite.

name: Oldslaught
description: Original Onslaught sprite. Unlocked after completing the 'Slayer' achievement.
